summary: Diff applies dark mode by default via `class='dark'` on the root HTML element and updates major components to use theme tokens (`bg-background`, `bg-card`, `text-foreground`, etc.) while continuing to reference the specified hero/logo/product images. One image-placement requirement (logo in footer) cannot be confirmed from the truncated App.tsx diff. Some unrequested UI embellishments (emoji/icons and broader theme work) appear to have been added.

missing_requirements.requirement: Brand mark uses /assets/generated/sw-professional-logo.dim_512x512.png in TopNav and footer and remains visible on the dark background.
missing_requirements.reason: TopNav usage is shown, but footer implementation is not visible in the provided (truncated) App.tsx diff, so footer logo usage cannot be verified from the evidence.

hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on default dark mode and preserving provided images; it does not request new iconography/emoji/metrics content additions.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/expanded a broader 'premium cosmetic theme' (color palette, OKLCH tokens, typography/shadows) in global CSS and Tailwind config beyond dark-default behavior.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-6/REQ-7 request dark mode by default and image legibility; a full palette/typography/shadow redesign is not explicitly requested and may be considered extra scope.
